message.raw:
Changes to queue operations: reruns, repeat, reordering.
You can now queue up an experiment that has already been run, or that is already in the queue. In either case a new h5 file is made and queued up for a rerun of the experiment.
You can also put the queue in 'repeat' mode, which will cause an experiment to be put back on the bottom of the queue once it completes (which triggers a rerun to be made from it, of course)
You can also reorder queued experiments with drag and drop.
Some minor prettification of the UI was also done :)

message:
Changes to queue operations: reruns, repeat, reordering.
You can now queue up an experiment that has already been run, or that is already in the queue. In either case a new h5 file is made and queued up for a rerun of the experiment.
You can also put the queue in 'repeat' mode, which will cause an experiment to be put back on the bottom of the queue once it completes (which triggers a rerun to be made from it, of course)
You can also reorder queued experiments with drag and drop.
Some minor prettification of the UI was also done :)
